quote: You know if you make a customer unhappy, they won’t tell five friends, they’ll tell 5,000 friends.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: For every leader in the company, not just for me, there are decisions that can be made by analysis. These are the best kinds of decisions!
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: I’d rather interview 50 people and not hire anyone than hire the wrong person.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: The most important single thing is to focus obsessively on the customer.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: What is dangerous is not to evolve.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: A brand for a company is like a reputation for a person. You earn reputation by trying to do hard things well.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: The death knell for any enterprise is to glorify the past – no matter how good it was.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: Work hard, have fun, make history.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: We are stubborn on vision. We are flexible on details…
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: Invention is by its very nature disruptive. If you want to be understood at all times, then don’t do anything new.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: There are two kinds of companies, those that work to try to charge more and those that work to charge less. We will be the second.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: If you’re not stubborn, you’ll give up on experiments too soon. And if you’re not flexible, you’ll pound your head against the wall and you won’t see a different solution to a problem you’re trying to solve.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: All businesses need to be young forever. If your customer base ages with you, you’re Woolworth’s.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: I strongly believe that missionaries make better products. They care more. For a missionary, it’s not just about the business. There has to be a business, and the business has to make sense, but that’s not why you do it. You do it because you have something meaningful that motivates you.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: If you never want to be criticized, for goodness’ sake don’t do anything new.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: If you’re competitor-focused, you have to wait until there is a competitor doing something. Being customer-focused allows you to be more pioneering.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: I think frugality drives innovation, just like other constraints do. One of the only ways to get out of a tight box is to invent your way out.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: The best customer service is if the customer doesn’t need to call you, doesn’t need to talk to you. It just works.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: We see our customers as invited guests to a party, and we are the hosts. It’s our job every day to make every important aspect of the customer experience a little bit better.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: Pick a movement. Pick something you believe in. Pick something you want to have an impact in and then question every single thing and be a founder, and be an entrepreneur inside those organizations and inside that movement.
author: Jack Dorsey

quote: I never wanted to be an entrepreneur. I actually wanted to be Bruce Lee.
author: Jack Dorsey

quote: My strength is programming. I also think my biggest strength is simplification. That’s what I love doing.
author: Jack Dorsey

quote: A founder is not a job, it’s a role, it’s an attitude. And it’s something that can happen again, and again, and again. In fact it has to happen, again and again and again. Otherwise we would not move forward.
author: Jack Dorsey

quote: I love making something complex. I love taking everything away, taking all the debris, the conceptual debris from a technology away so that you can just focus on what’s most important.
author: Jack Dorsey

quote: It’s really complex to make something simple.
author: Jack Dorsey

quote: You don’t have to start from scratch to do something interesting. You don’t have to start from scratch to have a massive impact on the world. You have to have a good idea. You have to convince other people of those good ideas. And you have to push as quickly as possible.
author: Jack Dorsey

quote: As CEO, my main job is editor-in-chief.
author: Jack Dorsey

quote: Make every detail perfect, and limit the number of details to perfect.
author: Jack Dorsey

quote: If we can perfect one experience for one individual, we can scale to every single one of the 7 billion people now inhabiting this earth.
author: Jack Dorsey

quote: The strongest thing you can cultivate as an entrepreneur is to not rely on luck but cultivating an ability to recognize fortunate situations when they are occurring.
author: Jack Dorsey

quote: Everything we do is about getting people to be more open, more creative, more courageous.
author: Jack Dorsey

quote: Really pay attention to negative feedback and solicit it, particularly from friends. …Hardly anyone does that, and it’s incredibly helpful.

quote: I think the best way to attract venture capital is to try and come up with a demonstration of whatever product or service it is and ideally take that as far as you can. author: Elon Musk

quote: Work like hell.
author: Elon Musk

quote: I think it is a mistake to hire huge numbers of people to get a complicated job done. Numbers will never compensate for talent in getting the right answer, will tend to slow down progress, and will make the task incredibly expensive.

quote: Starting and growing a business is as much about the innovation, drive and determination of the people who do it as it is about the product they sell.
author: Elon Musk

quote: The first step is to establish that something is possible; then probability will occur.

quote: Great companies are built on great products.

author: Elon Musk

quote: When I was in college, I wanted to be involved in things that would change the world.
author: Elon Musk

quote: If you’re trying to create a company, it’s like baking a cake. You have to have all the ingredients in the right proportion.
author: Elon Musk

quote: I don’t spend my time pontificating about high-concept things; I spend my time solving engineering and manufacturing problems.
author: Elon Musk

quote: I think it’s very important to have a feedback loop, where you’re constantly thinking about what you’ve done and how you could be doing it better.

quote: I think that’s the single best piece of advice: constantly think about how you could be doing things better and questioning yourself.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Small is not just a stepping-stone. Small is a great destination itself

quote: The longer something takes, the less likely it is that you’re going to finish it.
author: Jason Fried

quote: Ideas are cheap and plentiful. The original pitch idea is such a small part of a business that it’s almost negligible. The real question is how well you execute.
author: Jason Fried

quote: If you are going to do something, do something that matters.
author: Jason Fried

quote: If you’re opening a hot dog stand, you could worry about the condiments, the cart, the name, the decoration. But the first thing you should worry about is the hot dog. The hot dogs are the epicenter. Everything else is secondary.
author: Jason Fried

quote: If you do build a great experience, customers tell each other about that. Word of mouth is very powerful.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: The best legacy you can leave is the positive impact you make on other people’s lives.
author: Shervin Pishevar

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: If something is important enough, even if the odds are against you, you should still do it.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Unless you are a fortune-teller, long-term business planning is a fantasy
author: Jason Fried

quote: If I had asked my customers what they wanted, they would have said a faster horse.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: If your product is for everyone, your product is for no one. You must know who it’s not for.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: Age wrinkles the body. Quitting wrinkles the soul.
author: General Douglas MacArthur

quote: You don’t have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
author: Martin Luther King Jr

quote: Write your principles in pen and your business model in pencil.
author: Josh Kopelman

quote: Put the customer first. Invent. And be patient.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: In the old world, you devoted 30% of your time to building a great service and 70% of your time to shouting about it. In the new world, that inverts.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: Entrepreneurs don’t seek permission, but just do it and (if necessary) ask for forgiveness after.

quote: If things are not failing, you are not innovating enough.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Success is never accidental.
author: Jack Dorsey

quote: Every interaction with a customer is an opportunity to recruit a free salesperson.
author: Kyle Wild

quote: Industries are transformed by outsiders who think anything is possible, not insiders who think they already know what is impossible.
author: Aaron Levie

quote: People overestimate what you can do in 1 year and they underestimate what you can do in 10.
author: Marc Benioff

quote: There is nothing so useless as doing efficiently that which should not be done at all.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: If you think you are too small to be effective, you have never been in bed with a mosquito.
author: Betty Reese

quote: A business without a path to profit isn’t a business, it’s a hobby.
author: Jason Fried

quote: In organizations where engineering is completely separate, technology tasks to support marketing are almost always de-prioritized.  Marketing has to fight tooth and nail just to get a little bit of an engineers time. That will be a recipe for failure going forward.
author: Coelevate.com

quote: Don’t think about why you question, simply don’t stop questioning. Don’t worry about what you can’t answer, and don’t try to explain what you can’t know. Curiosity is its own reason. Try to comprehend a little more each day.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: What you do is what matters, not what you think or say or plan.
author: Jason Fried

quote: If everything seems under control, you’re just not going fast enough.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: Successful people don’t have a maximum level. They’re always pushing for more. There is no top. There is no success for successful people.

quote: I think a pivot can’t be more than 90 degrees. It’s an adjustment, or a course correction, but only rarely a complete abandonment. You can pivot once, or maybe twice, but after that you’ve got a real problem. You’ve gone from a pivot to a twirl.
author: Howard A. Tullman

quote: Before you start worrying about how to scale to 1000 customers you need to find one.
author: Brant Cooper

quote: The big mistake that entrepreneurs make is that they just start pitching instead of listening.
author: Brant Cooper

quote: To get started, break down your idea into testable elements. An effective experiment must clearly define these four elements: hypothesis, riskiest assumption, method, minimum criterion for success.
author: A common mistake I see many startup founders making is they aren’t solving a real problem…

quote: We have to focus on the WHY before we can focus on the HOW and WHAT.
author: Techcrunch

quote: Throughout my life I was never able to fully switch off and enjoy a concert, or a sports match. I would greatly respect their skill, but I could never avoid the thought that there were two types of people – the ones who were there doing it, and the ones who were watching. I didn’t want to spend even an hour just watching. I knew I could be the one doing it, and that’s how I wanted to spend my time.
author: Ivan Mazour

quote: Money is like gasoline during a road trip. You don’t want to run out of gas on your trip, but you’re not doing a tour of gas stations.
author: Tim O'Reilly

quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The scariest aspect in building a new product is that you have zero understanding of demand, until people give you money for the product. Asking a customer if they will buy an imaginary product never works.
author: Moment

quote: When who we are and what we do are one and the same, we are walking the road of Must. When we make something because we Must, not just because we can, it is the difference between disposable products that last a few years and life-affirming movements that sustain generations. When we choose Must, what we create is ourselves. It is a body of work.
author: Elle Luna

quote: The ubiquitous WD-40 lubricant got its name because the first 39 experiments failed. WD-40 literally stands for “Water Displacement–40th Attempt.” If they gave up early on like most of us do, we’d sure have a lot more squeaky hinges in the world
author: Fast Company

quote: When you’re ready to quit, you’re closer than you think.
author: Bob Parsons

quote: The very first company I started failed with a great bang. The second one failed a little bit less, but still failed. The third one, you know, proper failed, but it was kind of okay. I recovered quickly. Number four almost didn’t fail. It still didn’t really feel great, but it did okay. Number five was PayPal.
author: Max Levchin

quote: Whether it’s space travel or a new startup, if you don’t try you never know what you can achieve.
author: Richard Branson

quote: If you live for weekends or vacations, your shit is broken.
author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quote: You can’t be in denial about whose fault it is. We entrepreneurs tend to think we’re the smartest guys in the room. When a business fails, almost always it’s our fault. author: Inc

quote: The easiest way to go out of business is to be romantic about how you make your money.
author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quote: Being busy is not the same as being productive. In fact, being busy is a form of laziness — lazy thinking and indiscriminate action.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: Start something small before you start something big. You can learn so much when the stakes are low that will apply to future projects. Take that first step–it’s the hardest. Once you realize your own potential, the sky is likely the limit!
author: Colin Grussing

quote: If you have daily internal struggles with self doubt and indecision, you are almost certainly not going to achieve your mission, whatever it may be. I have found that, to a disturbing degree in this world, you have to believe your own hype to succeed.
author: Jeff Atwood

quote: You could have a million ideas, but they’re all worthless if you don’t get them done
author: Lauren Amarante

quote: Have a big vision, then make it 10x bigger. Having a compelling vision for where you want to take your business is important, but most first-time entrepreneurs think too small. author: Mitchell Harper

quote: No matter how brilliant your mind or strategy, if you’re playing a solo game, you’ll always lose out to a team.
author: Reid Hoffman

quote: Make one thing great. Get one thing right. That earns you the right to go from product one to product two. Take as much time as you need to get product one right, and to prove it—because if you don’t, no one is going to be waiting on pins and needles for product two.
author: Andy Dunn

quote: Passion is contagious. Humor is magic. And storytelling is an art.
author: Forbes

quote: The only way to win is to learn faster than anyone else
author: Eric Ries

quote: Success is defined in units of fun. It’s all about being happy.
author: Jake Nickel

quote: Find something you love and do it better than everyone else.
author: Gurbaksh Chahal

quote: If you’ve got an idea, start today. There’s no better time than now to get going. That doesn’t mean quit your job and jump into your idea 100% from day one, but there’s always small progress that can be made to start the movement.
author: Kevin Systrom

quote: If you are not embarrassed by the 1st version of your product, you’ve launched too late.
author: Reid Hoffman

quote: In between goals is a thing called life, that has to be lived and enjoyed.
author: Sid Caesar

quote: Have fun!
author: The biggest risk is not taking any risk…In a world that changing really quickly, the only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks.

quote: Fear is the disease. Hustle is the antidote… Whatever it is that you’re afraid of, go after it.
author: Travis Kalanick

quote: Do not focus on anyone but your customers.
author: Gabe Newell

quote: When I meet with the founders of a new company, my advice is almost always, ‘Do fewer things.’
author: Evan Williams

quote: Everyone has an idea. But it’s really about executing the idea and attracting other people to help you work on the idea.
author: Jack Dorsey

quote: We must learn what customers really want, not what they say they want or what we think they should want.
author: Eric Ries

quote: Small teams can take on bigger companies because of their focus and speed. That’s also what makes it fun.
author: Drew Houston

quote: Get shit done and get it done faster. There’s no point in going slow.
author: Steve Kaufer

quote: The trickiest part about thinking big is you still need to think small at the same time while executing.
author: Gabriel Weinberg

quote: Fun is more important than anything else. Focusing on anything other than your current situation means you’re planning on something that might not happen.
author: Sahil Lavingia

quote: More companies die of indigestion than starvation.
author: David Packard

quote: The #1 energy source for entrepreneurs is their passion for the business. It’s why 2 guys in a garage can compete against a fortune 500 company with unlimited resources.
author: Dan Martell

quote: The only way to move forward is to take one step at a time.
author: Konosuke Matsushita

quote: Learn by doing.
author: Vision without execution is just hallucination.

quote: You can’t get to wonderful without passing through alright. You can’t skip from not being able to function all the way up to running the whole show.
author: Bill Withers

quote: If you don’t enjoy it, don’t do it. You must love what you do.
author: Richard Branson

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: I want to do one thing and do it well.
author: Jan Koum

quote: If you’re changing the world, you’re working on important things. You’re excited to get up in the morning.
author: Larry Page

quote: I see life like one long university education I never had – everyday I’m learning something new.
author: Richard Branson

quote: Take calculated risks.
author: Success is not delivering a feature; success is learning how to solve the customer’s problem.

quote: Dream big!
author: Work smarter, not harder.
column3: The most successful businesses have an idea for the future that’s very different from the present.

quote: If you want something new, you have to stop doing something old.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Don’t think, just do.
author: The future is already here – it’s just not very evenly distributed.

quote: When you find yourself on the side of the majority, it’s time to pause and reflect.
author: Mark Twain
